name: Wealthfront
summary: Wealthfront offers automated investment management and financial planning using AI technology to optimize clients' portfolios.

name: Betterment
summary: Betterment uses AI algorithms to provide personalized investment advice and portfolio management for individuals.

name: Nutmeg
summary: Nutmeg is a UK-based digital wealth manager that uses AI to tailor investment portfolios to individual risk preferences.

name: Zest AI
summary: Zest AI leverages machine learning to improve credit underwriting and provide better financial advice based on data-driven insights.

name: Kavout
summary: Kavout employs AI to analyze financial data and provide investment recommendations through its Kai Score system.

name: Clara
summary: Clara uses AI to provide personalized financial advice and investment strategies for individuals and businesses.

name: Scalable Capital
summary: Scalable Capital is a European digital investment manager that uses AI to create and manage investment portfolios.

name: Tally
summary: Tally uses AI to help users manage credit card debt and optimize their financial health through personalized advice.

name: Bamboo
summary: Bamboo provides an AI-driven investment platform that allows users to invest in fractional shares of stocks and ETFs.

name: Freetrade
summary: Freetrade is a UK-based investment platform that uses AI to enhance user experience and provide investment insights.
